What did you do last week?

Last week, I was preparing for numerous final projects and exams, which demanded most of my time and focus. As a result, I was unable to finalize my k-means analysis. However, I made significant progress on my personal website, continuing to refine its structure and layout. This included organizing content and planning the integration of my projects.

What do you plan to do this week?

This week, I aim to further develop my personal website by integrating some of my past projects and improving its interactivity. While the k-means analysis remains on hold, I plan to revisit it after my exams to finalize and include it in my portfolio.

Are there any impediments in your way?

Final exams and project deadlines are the main impediments, significantly limiting my time for personal projects. Balancing these academic commitments while making steady progress on my website is a challenge I am currently navigating.

Reflection on the process you used last week, how can you make the process work better?

I think I made the right decision putting this project on the backburner due to it's near completion. Moving forward, I plan to allocate dedicated time blocks for this personal project once exams are over, ensuring completion in the upcoming week.
